snippet: A Miami Beach police officer has been placed on paid administrative leave while the department investigates the circumstances surrounding a teenager’s death.
abstract: Miami Beach Police Officer Jorge Mercado is placed on paid administrative leave while the department investigates the circumstances surrounding the death of Israel Hernandez-Llach, who collapsed when Mercado fired a Taser at his chest.
lead_paragraph: A Miami Beach police officer has been placed on paid administrative leave while the department investigates the circumstances surrounding a teenager’s death.

headline.main: Florida: Officer Put on Leave in Taser Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Florida: Officer Put On Leave In Taser Inquiry
